snapshotId.description: Corresponding snapshot id, which is the same as jobExecutionId

matchedProfileId.description: Id of the matcher profile which is applied for the record

matchedId.description: Represents relations with another matched records, necessary for saving the history of applying changes for inventory/holding/etc records

generation.description: Generation from the last record with the same matchedId incremented by 1

sourceRecordId.description: Reference to the corresponding source record

parsedRecordId.description: Reference to the corresponding parsed record

errorRecordId.description: Reference to the corresponding error record

..\\..\\raml-util\\schemas\\metadata.sch.title: Metadata Schema
..\\..\\raml-util\\schemas\\metadata.sch.description: Metadata about creation and changes to records, provided by the server (client should not provide)

createdDate.description: Date and time when the record was created

createdByUserId.description: ID of the user who created the record

createdByUsername.description: Username of the user who created the record (when available)

updatedDate.description: Date and time when the record was last updated

updatedByUserId.description: ID of the user who last updated the record

updatedByUsername.description: Username of the user who last updated the record (when available)
